Verses: 1 pinbu Dhevan Novaavaiyum, Avan Kumaararaiyum Aaseervadhiththu: Neengal Palugip Perugi, Boomiyai Nirappungal.

2 ungalaippatriya Bayamum Achchamum Boomiyilulla Sagala Mirugangalukkum, Aagaayaththilulla Sagala Paravaigalukkum Undaayirukkum; Boomiyile Nadamaadugira Yaavum, Samuththiraththin Machchangal Yaavum, Ungalukkuk Kaiyalikkappattana.
3 nadamaadugira Jeevajandhukkal Yaavum, Ungalukku Aagaaramaai Iruppadhaaga; Pasum Poondugalai Ungalukkuth Thandhadhupola, Avaigal Ellaavatraiyum Ungalukkuth Thandhen.
4 maamsaththai Adhin Uyiraagiya Raththaththode Pusikkavendaam.

5 ungalukku Uyiraayirukkira Ungal Raththaththirkaagap Pazhivaanguven; Sagala Jeevajandhukkalidaththilum Manushanidaththilum Pazhivaanguven; Manushanudaiya Uyirukkaaga Avanavan Sagodharanidaththil Pazhivaanguven.
6 manushan Dhevasaayalil Undaakkappattapadiyaal, Manushanudaiya Raththaththai Evan Sindhugiraano, Avanudaiya Raththam Manushanaale Sindhappadakkadavadhu.
7 neengal Palugip Perugi, Boomiyile Thiralaai Varththiththu Viruththiyaakungal Endraar.
8 pinnum Dhevan Novaavaiyum, Avan Kumaararaiyum Nokki:
9 naan Ungalodum, Ungalukkup Pinvarum Ungal Sandhadhiyodum,

10 ungalode Pezhaiyilirundhu Purappatta Sagala Jeevajandhukkalmudhal Ini Boomiyil Undaagappogira Sagala Jeevajandhukkal Pariyandham, Paravaigalodum, Naattumirugangalodum, Ungalidaththil Irukkira Boomiyilulla Sagala Kaattumirugangalodum En Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththugiren.
11 ini Maamsamaanavaigalellaam Jalappralayaththinaal Sangarikkappaduvadhillaiyendrum, Boomiyai Azhikka Ini Jalappralayam Undaavadhillaiyendrum, Ungalode En Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththugiren Endraar.
12 andriyum Dhevan: Enakkum Ungalukkum, Ungalidaththil Irukkum Sagala Jeevajandhukkalukkum, Niththiya Thalaimuraigalukkendru Naan Seygira Udanpadikkaiyin Adaiyaalamaaga:
13 naan En Villai Megaththil Vaiththen; Adhu Enakkum Boomikkum Undaana Udanpadikkaikku Adaiyaalamaayirukkum.
14 naan Boomikku Melaai Megaththai Varuvikkumpodhu, Andha Vil Megaththil Thondrum.
15 appozhudhu Ellaa Maamsajeevangalaiyum Azhikka Ini Jalamaanadhu Pralayamaaip Perugaadhapadikku Enakkum Ungalukkum Maamsamaana Sagala Jeevajandhukkalukkum Undaana En Udanpadikkaiyai Ninaivukooruven.
16 andha Vil Megaththil Thondrumpodhu, Dhevanukkum Boomiyinmelulla Sagalavidha Maamsajeevangalukkum Undaana Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyai Naan Ninaivukoorumpadikku Adhai Nokkippaarppen.
17 idhu Enakkum, Boomiyinmelulla Maamsamaana Yaavukkum, Naan Erpaduththina Udanpadikkaiyin Adaiyaalam Endru Novaavode Sonnaar.
18 pezhaiyilirundhu Purappatta Novaavin Kumaarar, Sem Kaam Yaappedh Enbavargale. Kaam Kaanaanukkuth Thagappan.
19 immoovarum Novaavin Kumaarar; Ivargalaale Boomiyengum Janangal Parambinaargal.
20 novaa Payiridugiravanaagi, Dhraatchaththottaththai Naattinaan.
21 avan Dhraatcharasaththaik Kudiththu, Verikondu, Than Koodaaraththil Vasthiram Vilagip Paduththirundhaan.
22 appozhudhu Kaanaanukkuth Thagappanaagiya Kaam Than Thagappanudaiya Nirvaanaththaik Kandu, Veliyil Irundha Than Sagodharar Iruvarukkum Ariviththaan.

23 appozhudhu Semum Yaappeththum Oru Vasthiraththai Eduththuth Thangal Iruvarudaiya Tholmelum Pottukkondu, Pinnittu Vandhu, Thangal Thagappanudaiya Nirvaanaththai Moodinaargal; Avargal Edhirmugamaaip Pogaadhapadiyinaal, Thangal Thagappanudaiya Nirvaanaththaik Kaanavillai.
24 novaa Dhraatcharasaththin Veri Thelindhu Vizhiththapodhu, Than Ilaiya Kumaaran Thanakku Seydhadhai Arindhu:
25 kaanaan Sabikkappattavan, Than Sagodhararidaththil Adimaigalukku Adimaiyaayiruppaan Endraan.
26 semudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga; Kaanaan Avanukku Adimaiyaayiruppaan.
27 yaappeththai Dhevan Viruththiyaakkuvaar; Avan Semudaiya Koodaarangalil Kudiyiruppaan; Kaanaan Avanukku Adimaiyaayiruppaan Endraan.
28 jalappralayaththukkuppinbu Novaa Munnootru Aimbadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhaan.
29 novaavin Naatkalellaam Tholaayiraththu Aimbadhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
